title: fatal error: unexpected signal during runtime execution
body:
Logs are hard to recover, so here's the best I've got:

```
$ geth -mine > ...
...

        /build/buildd/ethereum-0.9.20+19trusty/obj-x86_64-linux-gnu/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/miner/agent

.go:59 +0x133
```

People mention it here: https://github.com/golang/go/issues/9549, so I don't know what can be done about it...

I troubleshooted things a bit and it seems I had simply run out of disk space on the drive where .ethash lived

So I guess the only thing that could be done here is detect it and put an informative error message, though I don't know how hard that may be

Closing ticket
